data.englishTranslation: With the Name of Allah.(1)(If you forgot) With the Name of Allah, in the beginning and in the end.(2)
data.arabicVerse: (1)ِبِسْمِ اللَّه (2) بِسْمِ اللَّهِ فِي أَوَّلِهِ وَآخِرِه

data.englishTranslation: Whomever Allah has given food, should say: 'O Allah, bless us in it and provide us with better than it'.(1) Whomever Allah has given milk to drink, should say: 'O Allah, bless us in it and give us more of it'.(2)
data.transliteration: Allaahumma baarik lanaa feehi wa 'at'imnaa khayran minhu.(1) Allaahumma baarik lanaa feehi wa zidnaa minhu.(2)
data.arabicVerse: (1)اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فيهِ وَأَطْعِمْنَا خَيْراً مِنْهُ (2) اللّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيهِ وَزِدْنَا مِنْهُ
